en: In Ioannina, the Deputy Minister of Interior - He will participate in a government meeting on the damage caused by the bad weather. The areas affected by the heavy rainfall of the last few days will be immediately supported Vassilis Spanakis | Bad weather | Ioannina | Greece
la: In Ioannina, Prorex Minister Interioris - participet regimen conventus in damnis tempestatibus permotus. Areae gravi pluviis his diebus affectae statim Vassilis Spanakis sustinebuntur | Bad weather | Ioannina | Graecia
